title: Security & Data Model Baseline
description: Foundation for trust: RLS, encryption, audit logs, privacy controls.

title: Lock RLS on every table
description: Verify Row-Level Security across all new/existing tables; add policies where missing.

title: Add client-side encryption framework
description: Per-user keys; dev override for rharveybis@hotmail.com; plan for key rotation & migrations.

title: Implement audit logging
description: Capture CRUD events with who/when/what; store immutable audit trail.

title: Add GDPR/privacy controls
description: User data export & delete endpoints; document data retention.

title: Data Layer (Life Management Spine)
description: Wire real persistence for tasks, habits, goals.

title: Tasks CRUD with persistence
description: Fix save/reload bugs; filters by project/tag/status.

title: Habits CRUD and streak calculation
description: Simple streak logic; daily/weekly cadence fields.

title: Habit progress analytics (basic)
description: Counts, streaks, completion % (charts later).

title: Goals CRUD and link to tasks/habits
description: Goal ↔ Task/Habit relationships; status rollups.

title: Jobs Module Foundation
description: Store jobs, score them, and explode to tasks.

title: Create Jobs table schema
description: All fields for scoring, tagging, and metadata.

title: Manual job entry + edit
description: Form to add/edit jobs; validation & persistence.

title: Score calculation + manual override
description: Base scoring function with user override field.

title: Link jobs to tasks (auto-subtasks)
description: On job add: create subtasks, attach doc ids.

title: Unified Weekly View
description: Single source of truth for week plan.

title: Calendar aggregates Tasks/Habits/Goals
description: Internal aggregation first; external sync later.

title: Calendar filtering & colour-coding
description: Filter by type/status; quick legend.

title: Deadlines & streak markers
description: Show task deadlines and habit streak badges.

title: Error Handling & Test Harness
description: Stability and basic quality gates.

title: Global error boundary
description: Catch UI crashes; friendly fallback.

title: API error handling & messages
description: Surface API errors with actionable copy.

title: Minimal unit tests
description: Focus on Tasks, Habits, Jobs core paths.

title: Basic a11y & E2E smoke test
description: Keyboard nav + one happy-path flow.

title: Quick-Win Engagement Features
description: Stickiness boosters that don’t block MVP.

title: Next Best Action widget
description: Reads Tasks/Habits; suggests the next action.

title: Daily accountability check-in
description: Simple text capture & reminder hook.

title: CV/cover letter generator per job
description: Generate docs from profile + job data.

title: Post-MVP / Nice-to-Have Integrations
description: Do not start before MVP spine is stable.

title: External calendar sync (Google)
description: OAuth, 2-way sync, conflict handling.

title: External calendar sync (Outlook)
description: Graph API; similar to 7.1.

title: Email SMTP/IMAP integration
description: Alerts, follow-ups, job inbox rules.

title: External job API import
description: Indeed/LinkedIn adapters; rate limiters.

title: Plugin architecture core (RashPlugs)
description: Registry, loader, sandbox; versioning.
